channel.title: Need help with 1 part on making a server paying 1m rs money!
channel.description: do u no wot 2 do coz i stook on wot u do if u want to put somethin in a shop like wen u enter in de npc for a santa how do u put phats and stuff in de shop? please help paying 1mill cash on runescape if you help me add me on msn or write here helpppppppppppppppppppppppppp my msn mortezayadollahi@hotmail.co.uk[br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2007, 02:48:22 PM[/size][hr]I mean how do u enter items in a shop??? how u put stuff in de shop?????

mrs xxx1:

do u no wot 2 do coz i stook on wot u do if u want to put somethin in a shop like wen u enter in de npc for a santa how do u put phats and stuff in de shop? please help paying 1mill cash on runescape if you help me add me on msn or write here helpppppppppppppppppppppppppp my msn mortezayadollahi@hotmail.co.uk[br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2007, 02:48:22 PM[/size][hr]I mean how do u enter items in a shop??? how u put stuff in de shop???

In Moparscape we use you instead of “u” please fix your post and by the way go to shop.cfg and put in the itemid that you want to be in the shop.

item.title: Need help with 1 part on making a server paying 1m rs money!
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

You go to Shops.cfg in your directory folder. Then, you look for the shop youwish to add stuff too. The first number is the item ID# and the second is the amount. So it’s like this.
buy sell
Shop 10 (shopname) (2) (2) (itemID) (Itemamount) (itemID) (Itemamount) etc…

You can keep the money too.

Read full topic
